price: Kí o sì sọ fún àwọn tí kò gbàgbọ́ pé: “Ẹ máa ṣe bí ẹ ti fẹ́ nínú ẹ̀sìn yín. Dájúdájú àwa náà yóò máa bá ẹ̀sìn wa lọ.
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul lilladhīna lā yu'minūna iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innā ʿāmilūna
